abstract: In spite of myself, he made my life better.
snippet: In spite of myself, he made my life better.
lead_paragraph: "I bought my first computer in the spring of 1985," Alan Jacobs writes today: "the original 128K Macintosh." Then he lists the Mac products that he's owned and used in the decades since: an SE30, a PowerBook 100, a Performa 6116, a Performa 7500, an original iMac ("lime green"), a later-generation iMac ("the first one with a slot CD drive"), a PowerBook G3, a PowerBook G4, an iMac G5, three MacBooks ("one each for my wife, my son, and me"), a MacBook Air, an original iPod, a third-generation iPod, a first-generation iPod Nano, the first three generations of the iPod Shuffle, the original iPhone, an iPhone 3GS, and two iPads.
